name: LGSeochoCampusGuide
0:
”Alexa, ask lg seocho campus”
”Alexa, ask lg seocho campus how can I go to there”
”Alexa, ask lg seocho campus how does it look like”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: l. g. seocho campus
des: This is a guide skill which explains the way to go the Seocho campus of LG Electronics. You can ask the location, the way to go there and the image of campus. In order to ask location you can ask 'Alexa, ask lg seocho campus where is it'. Also you can ask 'Alexa, ask lg seocho campus how to go there' and you can tell either 'Sun-bawi' or 'Yang-jae'. And furthermore you can ask the image of campus and get the image as a response of a standard card.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
